title: Danièle Ajoret | Bernadette of Lourdes (Drama, 1961) Colorized Movie | Subtitles

sources.title: Danièle Ajoret | Bernadette of Lourdes (Drama, 1961) Colorized Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
This is the true story of Bernadette, a simple French peasant girl who claimed to have seen a vision of the Virgin Mary. After the sighting becomes well-known, thousands of people flock to the grotto at Lourdes, believing in the healing powers of the waters. Despite controversy surrounding her, Bernadette is ultimately elevated to sainthood by the Vatican.

Black and white version: https://youtu.be/p-Bp9JjuYcs
Original title: Il suffit d'aimer (1961)
Director: Robert Darène
Writer: Gilbert Cesbron
Stars: Danièle Ajoret, Bernard Lajarrige, Madeleine Sologne

@CultCinemaClassics

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
